Black Goop Pits
From the Pits Wiki
These people sure are making a pit! It's probably full of delicious things to eat.

The black goop pits are pits in California somewhere containing dissolved dinosaurs in the form of black goop. Some of the dinosaurs didn't dissolve and their bones are still in there somewhere.

Setting the Goop on Fire

Setting the black goop on fire is generally regarded by the United Nations as Not a Good Idea. Which is stupid, because companies burn the remains of dead dinosaurs all the time.

Tastiness

The United States government recommends not to eat the goop from the pits, but they're probably lying so they can steal it for themselves.
